name: grc-platform-monorepo
description: GRC Platform - Governance, Risk, and Compliance Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && flake8 src && black --check src
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: cd backend && black src && flake8 src
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -e .[dev]
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend

author: GRC Platform Team
